title: Hating You
description: Two years ago she ruined my family’s life.Maybe she thought it was only a little lie.That she did the right thing, that the worst was behind her, that no one had gotten hurt.Oh how naive the black haired beauty was.Fate has finally brought her back to me, to Blackthorn Academy.Once upon a time I was obsessed, consumed with the need to make her mine.Now I just want revenge, and I’ll do whatever I can to get it.You see the beautiful, sweet, Willow doesn’t realize the mistake she’s made yet. She doesn’t realize that she’s entered the lion's den and there won’t be any escaping her fate.I’m Parker Rothschild, and I’ll become her nightmare, her enemy, her bully.By the time I’m finished with her she’ll be begging me for forgiveness and pleading to confess her sins.
author: J.L. Beck
